Sentencas: This paper presents a new family of zero-voltage switching phase-shift-modulated dc-dc converters for a solid oxide fuel cell application.
Titulo: New ZVS phase shift modulated full-bridge converter topologies with adaptive energy storage for SOFC application

Sentencas: The proposed converters use a new technique of adaptive energy storage to minimize auxiliary circulating currents for all line and load conditions, thereby maximizing efficiency.
Titulo: New ZVS phase shift modulated full-bridge converter topologies with adaptive energy storage for SOFC application

Sentencas: A thorough analysis of the proposed topology, including the effects of rectifier junction capacitance, is conducted; and a design procedure presented.
Titulo: New ZVS phase shift modulated full-bridge converter topologies with adaptive energy storage for SOFC application

Sentencas: Experimental results from a 300 W per bridge, 20 V/300 V prototype are presented to validate the analysis.
Titulo: New ZVS phase shift modulated full-bridge converter topologies with adaptive energy storage for SOFC application

Sentencas: When compared to a widely used reference topology, the proposed topologies exhibit an efficiency improvement of 7% at full-load.
Titulo: New ZVS phase shift modulated full-bridge converter topologies with adaptive energy storage for SOFC application
